FERMENTABLE.NAME: Maris Otter Pale Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Base malt for english pale ales. Slight nutty flavour. Up to 100%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Pilsner Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Base malt for pale beers. Up to 100%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Vienna Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: To bring golden colour into beer and for better body. Up to 100%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Pale Ale Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Base malt for pale ales. Up to 100%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Munich Malt I
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: For amber and dark beers. Adds to typical beer character and darker colour. Up to 100%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Munich Malt II
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: For amber and dark beers. Adds to typical beer character and darker colour. Up to 100%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Rye Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Typical spicy rye character. Up to 50%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Bohemian Pilsner Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Base beer for light beers. Up to 100%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Biscuit Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Very lightly roasted malt, gives bread and cookie flavour. Up to 15%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Cara Hell
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: For fuller body and better foam. Up to 30%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Cara Amber
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: For red and amber beers, gives fuller body and better foam. Up to 20%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Cara Aroma
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: For amber and dark beers, gives fuller body and distinctive malt aroma. Up to 15%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Cara Belge
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: For belgian ales, slight caramel flavour. Up to 30%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Cara Bohemian
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: For bohemian beers, intensive caramel malt aroma. Up to 15%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Caramunich I
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: For fuller body. Adds malt aroma. Up to 10%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Caramunich II
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: For fuller body. Adds malt aroma. Up to 10%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Caramunich III
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: For fuller body. Adds malt aroma. Up to 10%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Carapils
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: For fuller body and better foam. Up to 40%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Carared
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: For fuller body and better foam. Gives a reddish colour. Up to 25%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Wheat Malt, Light
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Lighter, more crisp body, typical wheat aroma. Up to 100%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Wheat Malt, Amber
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Lighter, more crisp body, typical wheat aroma. Up to 50%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Wheat Malt, Roasted
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Roasted character on top of typical wheat aromas. Up to 5%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Wheat Caramel Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Darker colour, typical wheat aroma. Up to 20%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Carafa I
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Very dark colour, adds roasted flavour. Up to 5%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Carafa II
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Very dark colour, adds roasted flavour. Up to 5%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Carafa III
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Very dark colour, adds roasted flavour. Up to 5%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Rye Malt, Roasted
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Very dark colour, adds roasted flavour. Up to 5%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Roasted Barley
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Very dark colour, adds roasted flavour. Up to 5%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Brown Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: For british ales. Adds slight roast flavours and coffee and toffee aromas. Up to 15%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Oat Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds body and creaminess. Up to 30%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Abbey Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: For abbey ales, intensive malt aroma. Up to 50%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Wheat Malt, Smoked
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds smoke flavours to beer. Up to 80%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Smoked Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds smoke flavour to beer, typical for Rauchbiers. Up to 100%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Acid Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Used to lower mash PH. Up to 5%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Red X
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Special base malt for red ales and ambers. Red colour. Up to 100%

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Peated Whisky Malt
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Very peaty flavours

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Flaked Corn
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds body

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Flaked Barley
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds body

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Flaked Wheat
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds body

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Flaked Rice
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds body

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Flaked Oat
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Adds body

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Brown Sugar
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Rich, sweet flavor.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Sugar, Table
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Dries out beer. Too much adds a cidery flavour.

FERMENTABLE.NAME: Honey
FERMENTABLE.NOTES: Dries out beer. Can add some flowery flavours.
